item.description:
Here is a great flight that can't be missed. How about taking a day off on Friday or a half day and fly to Groton, CT for breakfast in Mystic. Here is the plan, we leave KFIT at 8:00 AM and fly south to Groton-New London. I have a van reserved at Landmar Aviation that Louise will drive us in safely to Mystic Seaport (by the way she is a very good driver). There is a tiny restaurant called "Little Kitchen" that is located right on the water, recommended by Rachael Ray. From there we can walk around explore the harbor then return to our planes around noon.

Mystic was one of our best trips last year on a Friday night. This time we thought it would be fun to return back here during the day. Once a year we take a Friday off and its always very fun and relaxing. So please RSVP and come if you can. Invite your loved ones and bring your camera. This should be a lot of fun!

http://www.airnav.com...

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Groton CT.-Mystic Seaport (KGON)
